title: BlueBlue Peach Kids Duvet Cover Set Twin 100% Cotton Bedding for Boys Girls Teens Single Bed Cartoon Tropical Fruit Print 1 White Comforter Cover with Zipper Ties 2 Pillowcases (Twin, Peach)
features: 100% COTTON DUVET COVER: Duvet cover is designed as a removable cover for your comforter, like a pillowcase and the pillow. You may use your comforter without a top bed sheet or flat sheet, as the duvet cover can really be removed and washable as often as your bottom sheet. Different duvet covers can bring different styles to your child's room.
TWIN SIZE: Package includes 1 Twin duvet cover 68 x 86 inches, 2 Standard pillow shams 20 x 26 inches. NO COMFORTER OR FITTED SHEET.
CARTOON PATTERN PRINT: Cartoon peach fruit pattern loved by children. Good choice as a birthday gift or holiday gift to your loved children, kids, boys, girls, teens, toddlers, friends, family.
ZIPPER & TIES: Hidden metal zipper closure and 4 corner ties to keep your comforter/ duvet/ blanket in place.
EASY CARE: Wash bedding before first use. Machine wash in cold water with similar colors. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach. We provide 30-day return/ replacement service.
